=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2017/01/17 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['---'], 'Producers': ['Lorne Michaels', 'Tina Fey', 'Ian Bryce', 'Charlie Gogolak', 'Eric Gurian', 'Sam Grey'], 'Starring': ['Tina Fey', 'Margot Robbie', 'Martin Freeman'], 'Studio': ['Paramount']} Review Text: I've seen the movie before, and it's a terrific movie! My reason for the ONE STAR rating, is I can not get ANYTHING to play on my computer on Prime Video. I have tried several titles, and not a one would play acceptably. All of them Stop, Pause, Jitter, Freeze, Lag, etc. It's like I'm trying to stream on a slow connection, and I'm using cable broadband 50Gb speed. If there was someone to ask questions about settings, perhaps, that may help, but alas, "here's the product, thanks for the payment, now buh-bye." NOT AT ALL satisfied with Amazon Prime Video. Review Title: Amazon Prime Video SUCKS Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/07/03 Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Jason Liquori'], 'Producers': ['Nancy Liquori'], 'Starring': ['Monique Parent', 'Michelle Prenez', 'Jennifer Wenger'], 'Studio': ['Hocus Focus Productions']} Review Text: Hilarious fun for everyone! Review Title: Great Fun! New Halloween Standard! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Transparent Review Date: 2018/07/16 Categories: Comedy, Drama, LGBTQ Product Description: ["Winner of eight Emmys and two Golden Globes, Transparent returns for a fourth season. The Pfeffermans take off on a spiritual and political journey as they dig deep into their family's history. Maura heads to Israel to speak at a conference and makes a startling discovery. Adrift in the desert, Maura, Ali, Sarah, Josh and Shelly set off on their own paths to find acceptance, love, and truth."] Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Joey Soloway'], 'Producers': ['Joey Soloway', 'Nisha Ganatra', 'Andrea Sperling', 'Victor Hsu', 'Bridget Bedard'], 'Starring': ['Jeffrey Tambor', 'Gaby Hoffmann', 'Amy Landecker']} Review Text: I am loving this show, but I just heard Jeffrey Tambor will NOT be in the fifth/final season of Transparent! Holy crackers! I'm so invested, I'm dying to know what happens to Maura, not to mention Ali, Joshy, Sarah&Len and that train wreck Shelly!
Dear Hollywood Actors (and all men, really)
Please, keep your hands to yourselves, your trousers zipped, and your mouths closed! Really, it isn't that difficult. Review Title: GREAT SHOW, GOING TO END TOO SOON Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: And Then There Were None Review Date: 2019/09/02 Categories: Suspense, Drama Product Description: ['As the world teeters on the brink of World War II, 10 strangers are invited to isolated Soldier Island. Among them are young secretary Vera Claythorne (Maeve Dermody, Serangoon Road), soldier Philip Lombard (Aidan Turner, Poldark), General John MacArther (Sam Neill, Jurassic Park), spinster Emily Brent (Miranda Richardson, Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire), and Justice Lawrence Wargrave.'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Craig Viveiros'], 'Producers': ['Abi Bach'], 'Starring': ['Aidan Turner', 'Maeve Dermody', 'Charles Dance']} Review Text: Not really an Agatha Christie fan, but watched this and THOROUGHLY enjoyed it! Review Title: Top-Notch Acting! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history reveals a strong affinity for engaging narratives across comedy, drama, and suspense genres, coupled with a notable appreciation for character-driven storytelling and quality production values. The ratings indicate a mixed sentiment, reflecting both enjoyment of overall content (high ratings for comedies and engaging dramas) and dissatisfaction with specific services like streaming quality. 

Common themes include a preference for works featuring notable actors and creators, highlighting an interest in recognizable talent. The reviews suggest a taste for both humorous content suitable for all ages and deeper, thought-provoking narratives, indicative of a versatile viewer. 

Quality is paramount, as evidenced by high ratings for well-produced items like those from acclaimed studios, yet there exists a sensitivity to service performance, specifically in streaming, where technical issues impact satisfaction drastically. 

The individual appears to actively engage in discussions about content quality and industry behavior (e.g., issues regarding actors), hinting at a strong connection to ongoing cultural conversations. Overall, core preferences emphasize a balance between quality storytelling, character depth, and a responsiveness to consumer service experience, guiding future viewing choices.
